review: So far it is working, but I did not expect to have to rent movies that are 20 years old.  What happened to prime movies galore?Nerflix seems to have it right.  There have been few exceptions where I could not look at the movies I wanted on Netflix,So, you tell me, why was 'Top Gun' going to cost $4.99 to watch.
author: GPS

review: It worked well for about a month and then I couldn't excess any movies. I still haven't sent it in for a new one.
author: Brian

review: This box show up on time..am loving and enjoying all the tv show and movie
author: malou mukendi

review: It did not meet my need. Not that the Fire TV Stick didn't work, it worked very well but not for what I wanted. I have a fire HD 7 and wanted to mirror whats on the Fire screen to my big screen TV. Can't do that with an HD 7, it requires an HDX 7 only. I didn't realize until I tried it to no avail. Information I had received was incorrect.
author: Willy
